title: Beads on a String-America's Racially Intertwined Biographical History
description: History was written in more than Black and White. With hyperlinks and videos Beads on a String-Americaâ€™s Racially Intertwined Biographical History never stops celebrating our heritages and lauds loudly the accomplishments of all races that helped make America the great country it has become.
